name: ░▒▓▌Unified Url+Search bar [hover Splitter]▐▓▒░
description:
A Simple script to unify the address and search bars.
HOVER the region between to pop up the splitter and click to move the split position.

[IMPORTANT!] Make sure there are no items between the the address and search bar (apart from default ones).
